test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic

publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'

$id: test_basic

publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:

    text: Test article

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_basic
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: input_val
            type: number
            required: true
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value: $input_val

test_cases.description: EQUALS comparison returns true when equal
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: "equal"
            else: "not_equal"

test_cases.description: EQUALS comparison returns false when not equal
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: "equal"
            else: "not_equal"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: NOT_EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: "not_equal"
            else: "equal"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'

        actions:
          - output: result

              operation: GREATER_THAN

            then: "greater"
            else: "not_greater"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_comparison
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        THRESHOLD: 18
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject: $THRESHOLD
              value: 15
            then: "above"
            else: "below"

test_cases.description: MAX/MIN with single value returns that value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_aggregate
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: max_result
            type: number
          - name: min_result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: max_result
            operation: MAX
            values:
              - 42
          - output: min_result
            operation: MIN
            values:
              - 42

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_logical
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: boolean
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: AND
            conditions:
              - operation: EQUALS
                subject: 10
                value: 10
              - operation: GREATER_THAN
                subject: 20
                value: 15

test_cases.description: IF operation with true test returns then value

$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET

articles:

        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then: 100
            else: 200

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in test
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject:
                operation: ADD
                values:
                  - 10
                  - 20
              value: 25
            then: "greater"
            else: "not_greater"

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in then
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional

publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:

            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 10
            then:
              operation: ADD
              values:
                - 50
                - 25
            else: 0

test_cases.description: IF with nested operation in else
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: EQUALS
              subject: 10
              value: 20
            then: 0
            else:
              operation: MULTIPLY
              values:
                - 5
                - 10

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

test_cases.description: SWITCH operation - no case matches, returns default
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 10
                  then: "first"
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 20
                  then: "second"
              default: "none"

test_cases.description: SWITCH with nested operation in then value
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        BASE: 100
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: x
            type: number
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when:
                    operation: EQUALS
                    subject: $x
                    value: 1
                  then:
                    operation: MULTIPLY
                    values:
                      - $BASE
                      - 2
              default: $BASE

test_cases.description: SWITCH with boolean variable in when clause
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_conditional
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: is_eligible
            type: boolean
          - name: is_fallback
            type: boolean
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            value:
              operation: SWITCH
              cases:
                - when: $is_eligible
                  then: "eligible"
                - when: $is_fallback
                  then: "fallback"
              default: "none"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_nested
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: ADD
            values:
              - operation: MULTIPLY
                values:
                  - 5
                  - 3
              - 10

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_nested
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: MULTIPLY
            values:
              - operation: ADD
                values:
                  - operation: SUBTRACT
                    values:
                      - 20
                      - 5
                  - 5
              - 2

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_nested
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: ADD
            values:
              - operation: MULTIPLY
                values:
                  - operation: SUBTRACT
                    values:
                      - operation: ADD
                        values:
                          - 10
                          - 5
                      - 5
                  - 3
              - 20

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_nested
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: string
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: GREATER_THAN
              subject:
                operation: ADD
                values:
                  - 10
                  - 20
              value:
                operation: MULTIPLY
                values:
                  - 5
                  - 5
            then: "greater"
            else: "not_greater"

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_nested
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Test article
    machine_readable:

      definitions:
        BASE: 10
        MULTIPLIER: 3
      execution:
        output:
          - name: result
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: result
            operation: ADD
            values:
              - operation: MULTIPLY
                values:
                  - $BASE
                  - $MULTIPLIER
              - 20

test_cases.description: Article in law_b calls law_a via URI

laws.yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_law_a
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Simple arithmetic test article
    machine_readable:
      definitions:
        BASE_VALUE: 100
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: input_value
            type: number
            required: true
        output:
          - name: add_numbers
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: add_numbers
            operation: ADD
            values:
              - $BASE_VALUE
              - $input_value

$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_law_b
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:

    text: Cross-law test article
    machine_readable:
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: my_value
            type: number
            required: true
        input:
          - name: result_from_a
            type: number
            source:
              regulation: test_law_a
              output: add_numbers
              parameters:
                input_value: $my_value
        output:
          - name: call_other_law
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: call_other_law
            operation: MULTIPLY
            values:
              - $result_from_a
              - 2

laws.yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_error
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: References missing law
    machine_readable:
      execution:
        input:
          - name: missing_value
            type: number
            source:
              regulation: nonexistent_law
              output: some_output
        output:
          - name: call_missing_law
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: call_missing_law
            value: $missing_value

test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_wet
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Bepaalt of iemand recht heeft op toeslag.
    machine_readable:
      definitions:
        MAX_INKOMEN: 50000
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: jaarinkomen
            type: number
            required: true
        output:
          - name: heeft_recht
            type: boolean
        actions:
          - output: heeft_recht
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
              subject: $jaarinkomen
              value: $MAX_INKOMEN
            then: true
            else: false

test_cases.description: Calculate toeslag amount based on income
test_cases.law_yaml:
$schema: https://example.com/schema/v0.1.0/schema.json
$id: test_toeslag
regulatory_layer: WET
publication_date: '2025-01-01'
articles:
  - number: '1'
    text: Berekent de hoogte van de toeslag.
    machine_readable:
      definitions:
        DREMPEL_INKOMEN: 25000
        PERCENTAGE_ONDER_DREMPEL: 0.05
        PERCENTAGE_BOVEN_DREMPEL: 0.02
      execution:
        parameters:
          - name: inkomen
            type: number
            required: true
        output:
          - name: toeslag_bedrag
            type: number
        actions:
          - output: toeslag_bedrag
            operation: IF
            when:
              operation: LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
              subject: $inkomen
              value: $DREMPEL_INKOMEN
            then:
              operation: MULTIPLY
              values:
                - $inkomen
                - $PERCENTAGE_ONDER_DREMPEL
            else:
              operation: ADD
              values:
                - operation: MULTIPLY
                  values:
                    - $DREMPEL_INKOMEN
                    - $PERCENTAGE_ONDER_DREMPEL
                - operation: MULTIPLY
                  values:
                    - operation: SUBTRACT
                      values:
                        - $inkomen
                        - $DREMPEL_INKOMEN
                    - $PERCENTAGE_BOVEN_DREMPEL
